name: whimsicality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being whimsical (= unusual and strange in a way that might be funny or annoying): The scarf is a great way to add a pop of colour and whimsicality to an outfit. The mother can't cope with her daughter's whimsicality. See
whimsical
More examplesFewer examplesHer work is known for its whimsicality, but lately it has taken a serious turn.The drama is cushioned with soft edges and whimsicality.The sculptures have a whimsicality that makes them unusually appealing as objects.
